answers.answer: My boyfriends brother's girlfriend had her baby about 2 months ago.She was diabetic,  and she had a very rough pregnancy. She had Iron problems,  and developed Pre-eclampsia pretty early. She had to be induced,  and when the baby was half way out,  they had to do a C-section because she was stuck!She had a lot more issues, but she got through it,  and she has the most beautiful little girl I have seriously EVER seen!
I have type 2 diabetes and my pregnancy is fine I just make sure I take Care of myself very well

I have type 2 and resort to insulin when I am pregnant. They monitor me very well to make sure all is well. I havr a healthy baby boy that came 9 days early and now 37 weeks pregnant with baby girl and everything  is on track!

question: Anyone here a diabetic? If so how did or how is your pregnancy going?
title: Anyone a type 2 diabetic?
